job_history.work_description: Served as the primary point of contact for the HR department for each assigned network by providing direct assistance or connecting them with the appropriate HR Specialist. Advised supervisors and management in performance management strategies and interventions, including reviews of disciplinary procedures and actions and recommendations for separations of employment. Assisted with formal and informal inquiries and investigations in conjunction with external legal counsel as necessary. Identified areas of opportunity for change initiatives that will positively influence assigned network performance and success.

job_history.role_name: Sr. HR Consultant and TA Specialist
job_history.work_description: Developed staffing strategies to fill vacancies and define position allocations. Reviewed referral candidates and contacted qualified individuals to request applications. Planned and executed recruitment events to bring in area candidates. Facilitated organizational development initiatives to conduct performance management and talent assessment.

Established measures to promote diversity and drive equal access to opportunity and advancement. Facilitated strategies planning through effective partnerships with leaders. Aided senior leadership during executive decision-making process, generating daily human resources reports on metrics and policies to recommend corrective actions and improvements.

Built a successful consulting business serving private and public sector businesses. Marketed business in Anchorage and Juneau, Alaska and Phoenix, Arizona. Established excellent rapport and professional relationships with business leaders. Created marketing materials, drafted proposals and bid on contracts.

skills.name: Human Resources
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in various HR roles, including HR Business Partner, Sr. HR Consultant, and Human Resources Consultant IV, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Developed staffing strategies, planned and executed recruitment events, and reviewed referral candidates, showing strong proficiency in recruitment.

skills.name: Performance Management
skills.explanation: Advised supervisors and management in performance management strategies and interventions, and facilitated organizational development initiatives, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Talent Management
skills.explanation: Facilitated talent assessment and development initiatives, and aided senior leadership in executive decision-making process, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Diversity and Inclusion
skills.explanation: Established measures to promote diversity and drive equal access to opportunity and advancement, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Built a successful consulting business, and established excellent rapport and professional relationships with business leaders, showing strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Consulting
skills.explanation: Built a successful consulting business, and provided HR consulting services to various clients, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Marketed business in various locations, and created marketing materials, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Planned and executed recruitment events, and facilitated organizational development initiatives, indicating a solid working proficiency.
